bibl.title: A New Testimony to the Letter to the Hebrews (2.9-11 and 3.3-6).
bibl.note: First published in electronic version in: Journal of Greco-Roman Christianity and Judaism 1 (2000) pp. 18-24, 2 figg. <http://www.jgrchj.com/>. - Fragment of a codex: parts of Heb. 2. 9-11 on the recto and Heb. 3. 3-6 on the verso. Fifth or possibly sixth century.
bibl.seg: PAPATHOMAS Amphilochios, A New Testimony to the Letter to the Hebrews (2.9-11 and 3.3-6).

First published in electronic version in: Journal of Greco-Roman Christianity and Judaism 1 (2000) pp. 18-24, 2 figg. <http://www.jgrchj.com/>. - Fragment of a codex: parts of Heb. 2. 9-11 on the recto and Heb. 3. 3-6 on the verso. Fifth or possibly sixth century.
